title: Capitolium?
content:
How many similar typefaces are there to [Capitolium](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006024031/http:/www.gerardunger.com/fontstore/store-capitolium.html)?

Cheers.

 [‹ I'm sure I know what this one is…](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006024031/http:/typophile.com/node/50157 "Go to previous forum topic") [Hello Pocatello, anyone know this font? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006024031/http:/typophile.com/node/50144 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jim_
